section.title: appliesTo
section.para: appliesTo â€“ Indicates a specific XLIFF element which is a sibling, or a child of a sibling element, to the change track extension within the scope of the enclosing element.
Value description: NMTOKEN name of any valid XLIFF element which is a sibling, or a child of a sibling element, to the change track extension within the scope of the enclosing element.
